Package util

Class CustomerQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.CustomerQuery
  • public abstract class CustomerQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the SQL queries select/insert/update/delete for Customer Records It also contains additional methods to query foreign key data in first_level_divisions and countries

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CustomerQuery()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void delete​(int customerID)
      Uses Customer ID to identify and delete Customer Data from the database and allCustomers ObservableList
      static void insert​(java.lang.String customerName, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String postalCode, java.lang.String phone, int divisionID)
      Adds Customer data from the Add Customer Page into the database and allCustomers ObservableList
      static int queryCountryID​(java.lang.String countryName)
      Looks up the CountryID using the Country Name - used in CreateUpdateCustomer
      static int queryCustomerID​(java.lang.String customerName, java.lang.String phoneNumber)
      Looks up the CustomerID in the database using the Customer Name and Phone Number
      static int queryDivisionID​(java.lang.String divisionName)
      Looks up the Division ID using the Division Name - used in CreateUpdateCustomer
      static void select()
      Selects all entries in client_schedule.customers and populates ObservableList allCustomers
      static void selectCountries()
      Selects all entries in client_schedule.countries to populate the Country ComboBox
      static void selectFLD​(int countryID)
      Selects all entries in client_schedule.first_level_divisions to populate the FLD ComboBox using the countryID information from the database to match the divisionID
      static void update​(java.lang.String customerName, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String postalCode, java.lang.String phone, int divisionID, int customerID)
      Uses Customer ID to update Customer data from the Update Customer Page into the database and allCustomers ObservableList

        public static void insert​(java.lang.String customerName,
                          java.lang.String address,
                          java.lang.String postalCode,
                          java.lang.String phone,
                          int divisionID)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds Customer data from the Add Customer Page into the database and allCustomers ObservableList
        Parameters:
        customerName - Customer Name
        address - Address, no first level division information
        postalCode - Postal Code/Zipcode
        phone - Phone Number
        divisionID - Division ID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL Exception

                          java.lang.String address,
                          java.lang.String postalCode,
                          java.lang.String phone,
                          int divisionID,
                          int customerID)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Uses Customer ID to update Customer data from the Update Customer Page into the database and allCustomers ObservableList
        Parameters:
        customerName - Customer Name
        address - Address, no first level division data
        postalCode - Postal Code/Zipcode
        phone - Phone Number
        divisionID - Division ID
        customerID - Customer ID

        java.sql.SQLException - SQL Exception
